title: Krakanos and the ghost
brief_description: A puppet animated film about Krakanos the good hearted king of the mountain who solves the mystery of a money hungry ghost. The ghost has taken to scaring away travellers from the village that is dependent on tourism for a livelihood. Krakanos decides that it is time that he intervened and teaches the ghost a well deserved lesson.
